{"title":"Turn Your Followers Into Customers With Instagram Shop","additional_content":"With those things in mind, we decided to take a different path and rethink the way
products and brands reach the attention of prospective buyers. What we found was a staggering shift in the ways
customers used to discover new products in the recent past and the actual ways that
same product discovery is happening today.","animation":"","animation_delay":""}
block.block_content: {{block class="MGS\Social\Block\Panel\Widget" mgs_panel_title="Turn Your Followers Into Customers With Instagram Shop" mgs_panel_note="With those things in mind, we decided to take a different path and rethink the way<br> products and brands reach the attention of prospective buyers. What we found was a staggering shift in the ways<br> customers used to discover new products in the recent past and the actual ways that<br> same product discovery is happening today." template="widget/snapppt_shop.phtml"}}
